title: Pixel 4 a charger protocol (quick charge? Power delivery?)
content:
I am looking for an alernate charger for my Pixel 4a. Being imported to the Netherlands, my Pixel came with a US adapter and the store enclosed a world adapter to make it work. Nice ofcourse, but the result is a clumsy solution.

The original charger is rated at 5V/3A or 9V/2A.
That's the only information I can find.

Does the Pixel 4a support Quick Charge? Or Power Delivery? Both? How can I determine if a charger I'm looking at will be supported?

Browsing my local shop, I have found 2 contenders with the following specs supplied (All USB-C ofcourse):


Trust Summa: 3A, 18W Power Delivery 3.0
Deltaco 3A, 18W Power Delivlery 2.0

Any insight would be much appreciated!

Regards,

Jan
